    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114057</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114057</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Three radiations passing through a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drei Strahlungen, die durch ein magnetisches 
überschreiten, fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trois rayonnements passant par un champ 
magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Três radiações que passam através de um campo
magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tre radiazioni che passano attraverso un campo 
magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρεις ακτινοβολίες που περνούν μέσω ενός μαγνητικού 
πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tres radiaciones que pasan a través de un campo 
magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a beam of mixed radiations (A+B+C) is separated into three single radiations (A, B, C) when the beam passes through a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alpha particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beta particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß ein Lichtstrahl 
der Mischstrahlungen (A+B+C) in drei einzelne Strahlungen getrennt 
wird (A, B, C), wenn der Lichtstrahl durch ein magnetisches 
überschreitet, fangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que un faisceau des 
rayonnements mélangés (A+B+C) est séparé dans trois rayonnements 
simples (A, B, C) quand le faisceau traverse un champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um feixe das 
radiações misturadas (A+B+C) está separado em três únicas 
radiações (A, B, C) quando o feixe passa através de um campo 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che un fascio delle 
radiazioni mixed (A+B+C) è separato in tre singole radiazioni (A, B, 
C) quando il fascio attraversa un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι μια ακτίνα των 
μικτών ακτινοβολιών (A+B+C) είναι χωρισμένη σε τρεις ενιαίες 
ακτινοβολίες (Α, β, Γ) όταν περνά η ακτίνα μέσω ενός μαγνητικού
πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una viga de las 
radiaciones mezcladas (A+B+C) está separada en tres solas radiaciones
(A, B, C) cuando la viga pasa a través de un campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
